text: “Gumazitamɨn borim arazir kuratam damightɨ, ia an arazir kuram ikarvaghsɨ, an amebam ko afeziam mɨsueghtɨ, aning aremeghan markɨ. Eghtɨ kamaghɨra, amebam ko afeziam arazir kuratam damightɨ, ia aningɨn arazir kuram ikarvaghsɨ, aningɨn boribav sueghtɨ me arɨmɨghiran kogham, Gumazim arazir kuram damightɨ, ia anarɨra mɨsueghtɨ, an aremegh.
